verses.verse: וּמִקְנֶ֣ה ׀ <WH4735> of cattle רַ֗ב <WH7227> multitude הָיָ֞ה <WH1961> had לִבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> Now the children רְאוּבֵ֛ן <WH7205> of Reuben וְלִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and the children גָ֖ד <WH1410> of Gad עָצ֣וּם <WH6099> great מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> had a very וַיִּרְא֞וּ <WH7200> and when they saw אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> the land יַעְזֵר֙ <WH3270> of Jazer וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> and the land גִּלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> of Gilead וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> indeed הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> that behold the place מְק֥וֹם <WH4725> [was] a place מִקְנֶֽה׃ <WH4735> for cattle

וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> came בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> The children גָ֖ד <WH1410> of Gad וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and the children רְאוּבֵ֑ן <WH7205> of Reuben וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> and spake אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to אֶלְעָזָ֣ר <WH499> and to Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to נְשִׂיאֵ֥י <WH5387> and unto the princes הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> of the congregation לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

עֲטָר֤וֹת <WH5852> Ataroth וְדִיבֹן֙ <WH1769> and Dibon וְיַעְזֵ֣ר <WH3270> and Jazer וְנִמְרָ֔ה <WH5247> and Nimrah וְחֶשְׁבּ֖וֹן <WH2809> and Heshbon וְאֶלְעָלֵ֑ה <WH500> and Elealeh וּשְׂבָ֥ם <WH7643> and Shebam וּנְב֖וֹ <WH5015> and Nebo וּבְעֹֽן׃ <WH1194> and Beon

הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> [Even] the country אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הִכָּ֤ה <WH5221> smote יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> which the LORD לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before עֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> [is] a land מִקְנֶ֖ה <WH4735> for cattle הִ֑וא <WH1931> he וְלַֽעֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <WH5650> and thy servants מִקְנֶֽה׃ <WH4735> have cattle ס

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> Wherefore said אִם־ <WH518> If מָצָ֤אנוּ <WH4672> they if we have found חֵן֙ <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight יֻתַּ֞ן <WH5414> be given אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֧רֶץ <WH776> let this land הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> likewise לַעֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <WH5650> unto thy servants לַאֲחֻזָּ֑ה <WH272> for a possession אַל־ <WH408> not תַּעֲבִרֵ֖נוּ <WH5674> [and] bring us not over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> Jordan

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> unto the children גָ֖ד <WH1410> of Gad וְלִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and to the children רְאוּבֵ֑ן <WH7205> of Reuben הַאַֽחֵיכֶ֗ם <WH251> Shall your brethren יָבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> go לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> to war וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you תֵּ֥שְׁבוּ <WH3427> and shall ye sit פֹֽה׃ <WH6311> here

וְלָ֣מָּה <WH4100> now why [תְנוּאוּן כ] (תְנִיא֔וּן <WH5106> break ק) אֶת־ <WH853> לֵ֖ב <WH3820> the heart בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵֽעֲבֹר֙ <WH5674> from going over אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> hath given לָהֶ֖ם יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> which the LORD

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> This עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> Thus did אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> your fathers בְּשָׁלְחִ֥י <WH7971> when I sent אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> מִקָּדֵ֥שׁ בַּרְנֵ֖עַ <WH6947> them from Kadeshbarnea לִרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> to see אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the land

וַֽיַּעֲל֞וּ <WH5927> For when they went up עַד־ <WH5704> up נַ֣חַל <WH5158> unto the valley אֶשְׁכּ֗וֹל <WH812> of Eshcol וַיִּרְאוּ֙ <WH7200> and saw אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land וַיָּנִ֕יאוּ <WH5106> they discouraged אֶת־ <WH853> לֵ֖ב <WH3820> the heart בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel לְבִלְתִּי־ <WH1115> did not בֹא֙ <WH935> that they should not go אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> had given לָהֶ֖ם יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> which the LORD
וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was kindled אַ֥ף <WH639> anger יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD'S בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> the same time הַה֑וּא <WH1931> and He וַיִּשָּׁבַ֖ע <WH7650> and he sware לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אִם־ <WH518> Surely יִרְא֨וּ <WH7200> shall see הָאֲנָשִׁ֜ים <WH376> of the men הָעֹלִ֣ים <WH5927> that came up מִמִּצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward אֵ֚ת <WH853> הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֛עְתִּי <WH7650> which I sware לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> unto Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> unto Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> and unto Jacob כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> not מִלְא֖וּ <WH4390> because they have not wholly אַחֲרָֽי׃ <WH310> followed

בִּלְתִּ֞י <WH1115> except כָּלֵ֤ב <WH3612> Save Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְפֻנֶּה֙ <WH3312> of Jephunneh הַקְּנִזִּ֔י <WH7074> the Kenezite וִיהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> and Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נ֑וּן <WH5126> of Nun כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מִלְא֖וּ <WH4390> for they have wholly אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> followed יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was kindled אַ֤ף <WH639> anger יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD'S בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> against Israel וַיְנִעֵם֙ <WH5128> and he made them wander בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> in the wilderness אַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> forty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years עַד־ <WH5704> until תֹּם֙ <WH8552> was consumed כָּל־ <WH3605> the entire הַדּ֔וֹר <WH1755> until all the generation הָעֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> that had done הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> now behold קַמְתֶּ֗ם <WH6965> And behold ye are risen up תַּ֚חַת <WH8478> place אֲבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1> in your fathers' תַּרְבּ֖וּת <WH8635> stead an increase אֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH582> men חַטָּאִ֑ים <WH2400> of sinful לִסְפּ֣וֹת <WH5595> to augment ע֗וֹד <WH5750> still עַ֛ל <WH5921> unto חֲר֥וֹן <WH2740> yet the fierce אַף־ <WH639> anger יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> against יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> toward Israel

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for תְשׁוּבֻן֙ <WH7725> For if ye turn away מֵֽאַחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> from after וְיָסַ֣ף <WH3254> him he will yet again ע֔וֹד <WH5750> again לְהַנִּיח֖וֹ <WH3240> leave בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> them in the wilderness וְשִֽׁחַתֶּ֖ם <WH7843> and ye shall destroy לְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> all this people הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> these ס

וַיִּגְּשׁ֤וּ <WH5066> And they came near אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to him וַ֣יֹּאמְר֔וּ <WH559> unto him and said גִּדְרֹ֥ת <WH1448> wall צֹ֛אן <WH6629> cattle נִבְנֶ֥ה <WH1129> We will build לְמִקְנֵ֖נוּ <WH4735> here for our cattle פֹּ֑ה <WH6311> here וְעָרִ֖ים <WH5892> and cities לְטַפֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH2945> for our little ones

וַאֲנַ֜חְנוּ <WH587> But we ourselves נֵחָלֵ֣ץ <WH2502> armed חֻשִׁ֗ים <WH2363> will go ready לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel עַ֛ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after אִם־ <WH518> lo הֲבִֽיאֹנֻ֖ם <WH935> until we have brought אֶל־ <WH413> to מְקוֹמָ֑ם <WH4725> them unto their place וְיָשַׁ֤ב <WH3427> shall dwell טַפֵּ֙נוּ֙ <WH2945> and our little ones בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> cities הַמִּבְצָ֔ר <WH4013> in the fenced מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> because יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> of the inhabitants הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

לֹ֥א <WH3808> We will not נָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> We will not return אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּתֵּ֑ינוּ <WH1004> unto our houses עַ֗ד <WH5704> until הִתְנַחֵל֙ <WH5157> have inherited בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> until the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5159> his inheritance

כִּ֣י <WH3588> because לֹ֤א <WH3808> we will not נִנְחַל֙ <WH5157> For we will not inherit אִתָּ֔ם <WH854> on מֵעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> with them on yonder side לַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> Jordan וָהָ֑לְאָה <WH1973> or forward כִּ֣י <WH3588> because בָ֤אָה <WH935> is fallen נַחֲלָתֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH5159> because our inheritance אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <WH413> about מֵעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> to us on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> Jordan מִזְרָֽחָה׃ <WH4217> eastward פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> about מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses אִֽם־ <WH518> If תַּעֲשׂ֖וּן <WH6213> unto them If ye will do אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this אִם־ <WH518> if תֵּחָ֥לְצ֛וּ <WH2502> if ye will go armed לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> to war

וְעָבַ֨ר <WH5674> over לָכֶ֧ם כָּל־ <WH3605> and all חָל֛וּץ <WH2502> all of you armed אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> Jordan לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD עַ֧ד <WH5704> until הוֹרִישׁ֛וֹ <WH3423> until he hath driven out אֶת־ <WH853> אֹיְבָ֖יו <WH341> his enemies מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> from before

וְנִכְבְּשָׁ֨ה <WH3533> be subdued הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> And the land לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> before יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD וְאַחַ֣ר <WH310> then afterward תָּשֻׁ֔בוּ <WH7725> ye shall return וִהְיִיתֶ֧ם <WH1961> become נְקִיִּ֛ים <WH5355> and be guiltless מֵיְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> before the LORD וּמִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> and before Israel וְ֠הָיְתָה <WH1961> become הָאָ֨רֶץ <WH776> and this land הַזֹּ֥את <WH2063> likewise לָכֶ֛ם לַאֲחֻזָּ֖ה <WH272> shall be your possession לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֤א <WH3808> you will not תַעֲשׂוּן֙ <WH6213> But if ye will not do so כֵּ֔ן <WH3651> so הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold חֲטָאתֶ֖ם <WH2398> behold ye have sinned לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> against the LORD וּדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> and be sure חַטַּאתְכֶ֔ם <WH2403> your sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after תִּמְצָ֖א <WH4672> will find you out אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

בְּנֽוּ־ <WH1129> Build לָכֶ֤ם עָרִים֙ <WH5892> you cities לְטַפְּכֶ֔ם <WH2945> for your little ones וּגְדֵרֹ֖ת <WH1448> and folds לְצֹנַאֲכֶ֑ם <WH6792> for your sheep וְהַיֹּצֵ֥א <WH3318> that which hath proceeded מִפִּיכֶ֖ם <WH6310> out of your mouth תַּעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> and do

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> spake בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children גָד֙ <WH1410> of Gad וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and the children רְאוּבֵ֔ן <WH7205> of Reuben אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <WH5650> Thy servants יַעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> will do כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> my אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> as my lord מְצַוֶּֽה׃ <WH6680> commandeth

טַפֵּ֣נוּ <WH2945> Our little ones נָשֵׁ֔ינוּ <WH802> our wives מִקְנֵ֖נוּ <WH4735> our flocks וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בְּהֶמְתֵּ֑נוּ <WH929> and all our cattle יִֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> shall remain שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there בְּעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> shall be there in the cities הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> of Gilead

וַעֲבָדֶ֨יךָ <WH5650> But thy servants יַֽעַבְר֜וּ <WH5674> will pass over כָּל־ <WH3605> everyone חֲל֥וּץ <WH2502> every man armed צָבָ֛א <WH6635> for war לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> to battle כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> my אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> as my lord דֹּבֵֽר׃ <WH1696> saith

וַיְצַ֤ו <WH6680> commanded לָהֶם֙ מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> So concerning them Moses אֵ֚ת <WH853> אֶלְעָזָ֣ר <WH499> Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> and Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נ֑וּן <WH5126> of Nun וְאֶת־ <WH853> רָאשֵׁ֛י <WH7218> and the chief אֲב֥וֹת <WH1> fathers הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <WH4294> of the tribes לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> to אִם־ <WH518> If יַעַבְר֣וּ <WH5674> will pass with you over בְנֵי־ <WH1121> unto them If the children גָ֣ד <WH1410> of Gad וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and the children רְאוּבֵ֣ן ׀ <WH7205> of Reuben אִ֠תְּכֶם <WH854> for אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֞ן <WH3383> Jordan כָּל־ <WH3605> everyone חָל֤וּץ <WH2502> every man armed לַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> to battle לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְנִכְבְּשָׁ֥ה <WH3533> shall be subdued הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and the land לִפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> before וּנְתַתֶּ֥ם <WH5414> you then ye shall give לָהֶ֛ם אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> them the land הַגִּלְעָ֖ד <WH1568> of Gilead לַאֲחֻזָּֽה׃ <WH272> for a possession
